If you haven't already, you will need to: 如果您尚未準備好，您將需要從我們的網站下載 elementary OS。您可以依照下面的指示將下載來的 ISO 檔案複製到 USB 隨身碟中。
elementary OS is currently built for two: elementary OS 目前支援兩種處理器架構，32 位元和 64 位元。
If you know you have a newer computer wi: 如果您知道您擁有的是搭配 64 位元處理器之較新的電腦，選擇 64 位元版本。
If your computer is older or you do not: 如果您的電腦比較舊或者您不清楚您的電腦使用哪種處理器，選擇 32 位元版本。(64 位元的處理器在這個版本依然可以運作)
Intel i3 or comparable dual-core 64-bit: Intel i3 或同等的雙核心 64 位元處理器
Make sure to back your important data up: 請確認您已經備份您的重要資料到雲端服務或是外接硬碟的外部空間。安裝一套新的作業系統可能會複寫您現有的資料。
Choose your current Operating System: 選擇您目前所使用的作業系統
Select the operating system you are curr: 選擇您目前使用的作業系統來閱讀針對它所撰寫的安裝說明。
Verifying your download is an important,: 檢驗你的下載檔案很重要，雖然我們不強求。我們從 elementary OS 影像檔製作 checksum (或 hash sum) 並且建議您在安裝之前檢查您檔案的 checksum。 這樣確保您下載的檔案完整且沒有任何損壞。
Windows doesn't include a built-in tool: 微軟 Windows 作業系統沒有內建驗證 SHA256 檢查碼的驗證工具，所以我們需要去下載 Hash Tool.
Under &quot;Input File&quot; select <cod: 在 "Input File" 選項中選擇 Select File(s) 並且找到 elementary OS ISO 檔案。
Verify that the text in &quot;Results&qu: 在 "Results" 文字中驗證以下其中一個雜湊值（hashes）。
Rufus - select ISO: Rufus - 選取 ISO 檔案
You'll need a USB flash drive with at le: You'll need a USB flash drive with at least 1 GB of free space and a program called Rufus.
Insert your USB drive and select it in t: Insert your USB drive and select it in the "Device" list
Select &quot;ISO Image&quot; next to &qu: Select "ISO Image" next to "Create a bootable disk using..."
to choose the ISO that you downloaded pr: 選擇您先前下載的 ISO 檔案。
Click &quot;Start&quot; and wait for the: Click "Start" and wait for the process to finish.
In order to start the installation proce: 為了開始安裝過程，您必須利用安裝媒介開機。
Assuming that your computer is still on,: 如果您的電腦依然開著，請先插入您的安裝媒介然後重新啓動您的電腦。
Most computers will briefly allow you to: 多數的電腦會允許您按下特殊按鈕來改變這次開機順序 — 通常是 <kbd>F12</kbd>，不過有時是 <kbd>Esc</kbd> 或其他功能鍵。詳細請參考螢幕上的資訊或是您電腦的文件。
Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate: 按下 <kbd>F12</kbd> ( 或者適合的按鍵 ) 並選擇安裝裝置—通常是 "USB-HDD" 或者其他跟 "USB" 有關的選項，但或許會有點不同。如果您選擇了錯誤的裝置，您的電腦將會像平常一樣載入，只要重新啟動您的電腦，並試試清單中其他的裝置。
Shortly after selecting the appropriate: 當您選取了正確的引導驅動器后，您就會看到作業系統的背景圖。接下來，您只需按照熒幕上的指示和嚮導來進行餘下的安裝進程。
Running the following command in your te: 在您的終端機執行以下的指令:
Before creating an install drive, make s: 在您製作安裝磁碟之前，請先確認您安裝了所有 OS X 的更新。打開 Apple Menu 然後選擇 “軟體更新...” 或 “App Store...”。 請確認您安裝了所有系統更新還有任何標名 “韌體” 或 “Boot Camp” 的更新。
You'll need a USB flash drive with at le: You'll need a USB flash drive with at least 1 GB of free space and a program called "Create elementary Installer".
Open &quot;Create elementary Installer&q: Open "Create elementary Installer". If your Mac cannot open it because it's from an unidentifiable developer, right click the app, and select "Open".
Insert the spare USB drive, and select t: Insert the spare USB drive, and select the ISO file you've just downloaded.
Create elementary OS USB Installer: 創建elementary OS的隨身碟安裝器
Select your USB drive to start the insta: Select your USB drive to start the installer creation process.
If your Mac doesn't recognize the result: 如果你的蘋果機不能在引導介面中識別你做好的隨身碟，你可能需要創建一個elementary OS的安裝光碟。如果你想用光碟安裝，你需要先插入一張無內容光碟，然後在Finder中右鍵選中鏡像文檔，最後選擇“把elementaryos-freya-xx.xx.iso“燒録至光碟設備。
After you hear the chime, press and hold: 當您聽到啟動提示音后，按住<kbd>選項</kbd>，然後選擇相應的引導驅動器。要記住它有可能被錯誤地識別為“Windows”，此屬正常現象。
You'll need a USB flash drive with at le: You'll need a USB flash drive with at least 1 GB of free space and a program called UNetbootin.
Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will o: 在Dash中開啓UNetbootin，它會打開一個像下圖的視窗：
Click &quot;…&quot; to select the ISO th: Click "…" to select the ISO that you downloaded previously.
Unplug all USB memory devices apart from: Unplug all USB memory devices apart from the one you want to use.
Click &quot;OK&quot; and wait for the pr: Click "OK" and wait for the process to finish.
Take this time to read the <a href=\"/do: 用這段時間閲讀指導手冊以學習你的新系統。
